Reviews.Title: No instruction manual
Reviews.Author: Chuck Williams
Reviews.Content: I received this and it looks nice.  However, it did not come with an instruction manual so I have no idea how to set it up.  I found a video on you tube, but it is in Chinese (mandarin or whatever).  So I will have to try to figure this out from the video with no English instructions.  Also, from the video, it appears that you might need an iphone for the functions to work, like the gps.  I bought it so my daughter would have a phone so I don't mind too much about the gps thing, but unless I can figure out how to program this thing it will be only a watch

Reviews.Title: You should buy it
Reviews.Author: Assad Assad
Reviews.Content: I got this for my  little sister and she loved it she was thanking me like crazy so buy it

ProductInfo.Features:
a cute mobile phone and GPS tracker phone for kids or teenagers
It provides not only a unique way for your children to make or receive calls, but also a safety GPS tracker for parents
Auto SMS message sent to guardian numbers when watch enters/leaves waypoint locations
Up to 4 Guardian/parental numbers saved for notifications/querries
if phone watch is connected to parents phone over bluetooth and is separated by over 10 meters, a message will automatically be sent to the phone
ProductInfo.Name: TBS3202® Kids Wrist Watch Unlocked Cell Phone GPS Tracker GSM GPRS SOS Wrist Watch SmartPhone MP3 Bluetooth Tethering For Girls (Pink)
